Summary: Star like Object very bright coming down wards from the night sky
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Sunbury
There were no other sightings in Sunbury on or around September 21st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was setting on my front porch talking on the Phone to a friend and I happened to look up in to the night sky and see a very Bright what would look to be a Star but this one was moving down wards very slowly I told my friend over the Phone of what I seen and I was banging On my screen door to get my Mothers attention but by the time she came to the screen door this object got real dim and all I could see is a spec of light and then nothing
